agent_settings.agent_type_info: Select the type of agent to use
agent_settings.max_steps_info: Maximum number of steps the agent will take
agent_settings.max_actions_per_step_info: Maximum number of actions the agent will take per step
agent_settings.use_vision_info: Enable vision capabilities for the agent
agent_settings.tool_calling_method_info: Method to use for tool calling
agent_settings.max_input_tokens_info: Maximum number of tokens to use for input

llm_settings.provider_info: Select the LLM provider to use
llm_settings.num_ctx_info: Maximum context length for the model
llm_settings.temperature_info: Temperature for the model (higher = more creative, lower = more deterministic)
llm_settings.base_url_info: Base URL for the LLM API
llm_settings.api_key_info: API key for the LLM provider

browser_settings.keep_browser_open_info: Keep the browser open after the agent finishes
browser_settings.headless_info: Run the browser in headless mode

task.task_input_info: Enter the task for the agent to perform
task.add_infos_info: Provide any additional information or context for the agent
